column4: ubuntu freezes debian unstable every 6 months
effectively ubuntu is debian + modifications 10 million per year buys you

either way Ubuntu has more software available via apt-get than Debian..
the exact same software from debian is in ubuntu
then tell me .. how do I apt-get install the binary only Nvidia drivers for my card.. in Debian? can do it in Ubuntu using the non-free section? ...
ubuntyu repos = debian repost ,its that simple
having a handfull of prepackaged apps that you can also get installed on debian with a few extra commands is not really saying IT HAS MORE SOFTWARE
ubuntu and debian old timers are telling you they are the same, therefore they are

its not about right or wrong, its about listening.  some things are well known, comming into this channel claiming somiething that is clearly wrong simply requires a little bit of humbleness to consider that you might indeed be wrong

i don't believe for one second that you run debian

hrm.. why else do you think I chose Debian? I've been running Linux since '95, started debian around 01.. fel in love with apt-get :) and dpkg...a friend gave me an ubuntu CD.. and it fixed some problems I was having with Debian.
it will implement whatever has or will become a free spec
